overview: Mr. Casilli has over 15 years of experience in direct and channel sales, business development, and marketing. He joined WANdisco from Soluziona USA where he served as Vice President of Sales & Marketing. He has held various sales and marketing positions at software and services companies including Endymion, Tacit Software, IconMedialab, and eBusiness Technologies and was the co-founder of FourA Technology Group. He began his career as a financial consultant for Merrill Lynch. Mr. Casilli holds a B.A. in English from the University of California, Los Angeles.
